QUOTE: To me, a building - if it's beautiful - is the love of one man, he's made it out of his love for space, materials, things like that.
AUTHOR: Martha Graham

AUTHOR: Arthur Erickson

QUOTE: If you give people nothingness, they can ponder what can be achieved from that nothingness.
AUTHOR: Tadao Ando

QUOTE: Even though I build buildings and I pursue my architecture, I pursue it as an artist. I deliberately keep a tiny studio. I don't want to be an architectural firm. I want to remain an artist.

QUOTE: Architecture is the reaching out for the truth.

QUOTE: The interior of the house personifies the private world; the exterior of it is part of the outside world.

QUOTE: Form follows profit is the aesthetic principle of our times.
AUTHOR: Richard Rogers

QUOTE: We should concentrate our work not only to a separated housing problem but housing involved in our daily work and all the other functions of the city.
AUTHOR: Alvar Aalto

QUOTE: When you look at Japanese traditional architecture, you have to look at Japanese culture and its relationship with nature. You can actually live in a harmonious, close contact with nature - this very unique to Japan.
AUTHOR: Tadao Ando

QUOTE: Don't leave home without your sword - your intellect.
AUTHOR: Alan Moore

QUOTE: Remember to be as smart as you are.
AUTHOR: Judd Nelson

QUOTE: Some ways of using our thinking are really inspiring. There are people who use their thinking to race cars. People use their thinking to build rockets to the moon. It's all just a use of your thinking.

QUOTE: Intelligence is not a science.
AUTHOR: Frank Carlucci

QUOTE: Intellectuals are too sentimental for me.
AUTHOR: Margaret Anderson

QUOTE: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
AUTHOR: Michael Jordan

QUOTE: I don't think the intelligence reports are all that hot. Some days I get more out of the New York Times.
AUTHOR: John F. Kennedy

QUOTE: Being busy does not always mean real work. The object of all work is production or accomplishment and to either of these ends there must be forethought, system, planning, intelligence, and honest purpose, as well as perspiration. Seeming to do is not doing.

QUOTE: If you would take, you must first give, this is the beginning of intelligence.
AUTHOR: Lao Tzu

QUOTE: Science has not yet taught us if madness is or is not the sublimity of the intelligence.
AUTHOR: Edgar Allan Poe

QUOTE: The first method for estimating the intelligence of a ruler is to look at the men he has around him.
AUTHOR: Niccolo Machiavelli

QUOTE: There are three kinds of intelligence: one kind understands things for itself, the other appreciates what others can understand, the third understands neither for itself nor through others. This first kind is excellent, the second good, and the third kind useless.

QUOTE: Shall I not have intelligence with the earth? Am I not partly leaves and vegetable mould myself.
AUTHOR: Henry David Thoreau

QUOTE: I would like to take you seriously, but to do so would be an affront to your intelligence.
AUTHOR: George Bernard Shaw

QUOTE: Bottom line is, I didn't return to Apple to make a fortune. I've been very lucky in my life and already have one. When I was 25, my net worth was $100 million or so. I decided then that I wasn't going to let it ruin my life. There's no way you could ever spend it all, and I don't view wealth as something that validates my intelligence.
AUTHOR: Steve Jobs

QUOTE: I don't even call it violence when it's in self defense; I call it intelligence.
AUTHOR: Malcolm X

QUOTE: Everything in the universe has a purpose. Indeed, the invisible intelligence that flows through everything in a purposeful fashion is also flowing through you.
AUTHOR: Wayne Dyer

QUOTE: Immaturity is the incapacity to use one's intelligence without the guidance of another.
AUTHOR: Immanuel Kant

QUOTE: Military intelligence is a contradiction in terms.
AUTHOR: Groucho Marx

QUOTE: Humanity I love you because when you're hard up you pawn your intelligence to buy a drink.
AUTHOR: e. e. cummings

QUOTE: When I can look life in the eyes, grown calm and very coldly wise, life will have given me the truth, and taken in exchange - my youth.

QUOTE: Every silver lining has a cloud.

QUOTE: Public opinion is no more than this: what people think that other people think.

QUOTE: If you want to be found stand where the seeker seeks.

QUOTE: Rarely promise, but, if lawful, constantly perform.
AUTHOR: William Penn

QUOTE: What is man's ultimate direction in life? It is to look for love, truth, virtue, and beauty.

QUOTE: Perspective is worth 80 IQ points.

QUOTE: It is the neglect of timely repair that makes rebuilding necessary.

QUOTE: Wise kings generally have wise counselors; and he must be a wise man himself who is capable of distinguishing one.

QUOTE: The opportunity for brotherhood presents itself every time you meet a human being.

QUOTE: Life is a travelling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.

QUOTE: You can't sweep other people off their feet, if you can't be swept off your own.

QUOTE: He who devotes sixteen hours a day to hard study may become at sixty as wise as he thought himself at twenty.

QUOTE: It is much more difficult to measure nonperformance than performance.

QUOTE: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.

QUOTE: The future has already arrived. It's just not evenly distributed yet.

QUOTE: It is astonishing with how little wisdom mankind can be governed, when that little wisdom is its own.

AUTHOR: Juvenal

QUOTE: If you believe the doctors, nothing is wholesome; if you believe the theologians, nothing is innocent; if you believe the military, nothing is safe.

QUOTE: The wisdom of the wise is an uncommon degree of common sense.
AUTHOR: Dean Inge

QUOTE: Counsel woven into the fabric of real life is wisdom.
AUTHOR: Walter Benjamin

QUOTE: Virtues are acquired through endeavor, which rests wholly upon yourself.
AUTHOR: Sidney Lanier

QUOTE: Man's wisdom is his best friend; folly his worst enemy.
AUTHOR: William Temple

AUTHOR: Harry Seidler

QUOTE: Proportions are what makes the old Greek temples classic in their beauty. They are like huge blocks, from which the air has been literally hewn out between the columns.

QUOTE: Not many architects have the luxury to reject significant things.
AUTHOR: Rem Koolhaas

QUOTE: But I absolutely believe that architecture is a social activity that has to do with some sort of communication or places of interaction, and that to change the environment is to change behaviour.
AUTHOR: Thom Mayne

QUOTE: The dialogue between client and architect is about as intimate as any conversation you can have, because when you're talking about building a house, you're talking about dreams.
AUTHOR: Robert A. M. Stern

QUOTE: Cities are the greatest creations of humanity.
AUTHOR: Daniel Libeskind

QUOTE: Architecture is invention.
AUTHOR: Oscar Niemeyer

QUOTE: The work of art shows people new directions and thinks of the future. The house thinks of the present.
AUTHOR: Adolf Loos

QUOTE: Rome has not seen a modern building in more than half a century. It is a city frozen in time.
AUTHOR: Richard Meier

QUOTE: Designed by architects with honorable intentions but hands of palsy.
AUTHOR: Jimmy Breslin

QUOTE: For many years, I have lived uncomfortably with the belief that most planning and architectural design suffers for lack of real and basic purpose. The ultimate purpose, it seems to me, must be the improvement of mankind.

QUOTE: The bungalow had more to do with how Americans live today than any other building that has gone remotely by the name of architecture in our history.
AUTHOR: Russell Lynes

QUOTE: No architect troubled to design houses that suited people who were to live in them, because that would have meant building a whole range of different houses. It was far cheaper and, above all, timesaving to make them identical.

QUOTE: Don't clap too hard - it's a very old building.
AUTHOR: John Osborne

QUOTE: As architects we are often involved in the concrete-steel-and-glass aspect of it, but cities are social structures, and to be involved in imagining the future of cities and the type of relationships and the types of places that we're making is something that intrigues me very much.
AUTHOR: Michael Arad

QUOTE: Color in certain places has the great value of making the outlines and structural planes seem more energetic.
AUTHOR: Antonio Gaudi

QUOTE: I'm often called an old-fashioned modernist. But the modernists had the absurd idea that architecture could heal the world. That's impossible. And today nobody expects architects to have these grand visions any more.

QUOTE: I don't believe in morality in architecture.
AUTHOR: Michael Graves

QUOTE: Each new situation requires a new architecture.

QUOTE: The frightening thought that what you draw may become a building makes for reasoned lines.
AUTHOR: Saul Steinberg

QUOTE: My buildings will be my legacy... they will speak for me long after I'm gone.

QUOTE: My main hope for myself is to be where I am.
AUTHOR: Woody Harrelson

QUOTE: I don't feel despair because I am able to make the films I want to make, and that gives me hope.
AUTHOR: Alexander Payne

AUTHOR: Channing Tatum

QUOTE: 'A Guide To Recognizing Your Saints' was the first real actor-actor part I did, and I hope I to do more. Action movies are fun, but I'd be happy not to do them if there are better roles.
AUTHOR: Channing Tatum

QUOTE: I share the opinion of those of broader vision, who see in the signs of the time hope of humanity for peace.

QUOTE: I'm more than open to hope, but I think men and women have a difficult time dealing with each other and often take the low road.

QUOTE: We need to keep hope alive and strive to do better.

QUOTE: The moment that changed me for ever was the moment my first child was born. I was happy, filled with hope, and thought, 'Now I understand the whole point of work, of life, of love.'
AUTHOR: Paul Theroux

That gives both the Middle East and the West a small and distant hope of security.
AUTHOR: James Buchan

QUOTE: I think sometimes all you need is to hear someone else say the same thing that you're going through to realize that you're not alone. I try to put some sense of hope into the songs, into whatever the situation is so that it's not just dirt, drudgery and a life of misery.

QUOTE: What you hope for, like Unforgiven did a lot to give you a chance to do it again sometime.

QUOTE: Take hope from the heart of man and you make him a beast of prey.

AUTHOR: Aaron Carter

AUTHOR: Tom Clancy

QUOTE: I've had some incredible moments in my life - thus far. I hope a lot more are coming.

QUOTE: We are all here to be a service to those who can't be a service to themselves. We can give people hope and more reasons for being human.

QUOTE: My hope is that flexible working and varying shift patterns will give workers a taste for idling and that they will gradually demand greater reductions in the length of the working week.
AUTHOR: Tom Hodgkinson

QUOTE: Like when I host a party. I hope my guests get along. But if not, how interesting!
AUTHOR: Andy Cohen

QUOTE: Well, you know, the definition of second marriage is the triumph of hope over experience.
AUTHOR: George Will

I hope you're having a beautiful one.' Sadly, I haven't been doing a lot of kissing lately.
AUTHOR: Chloe Sevigny

QUOTE: When audiences come to see us authors lecture, it is largely in the hope that we'll be funnier to look at than to read.

QUOTE: I had no idea of the size of my bank account as a teen, and I didn't care to know. That was my mom's job, I figured that I would just find out when I turned 18. If you can't trust your mom, then who can you trust?

AUTHOR: Emily Giffin

QUOTE: I don't want to just be in the normal kind of teen movie.

QUOTE: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in awhile, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.

QUOTE: Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth.

QUOTE: God has cared for these trees, saved them from drought, disease, avalanches, and a thousand tempests and floods. But he cannot save them from fools.

QUOTE: I did not become a vegetarian for my health, I did it for the health of the chickens.

QUOTE: Every time I have some moment on a seashore, or in the mountains, or sometimes in a quiet forest, I think this is why the environment has to be preserved.

QUOTE: There can be no greater error than to expect, or calculate, upon real favors from nation to nation. It is an illusion which experience must cure, which a just pride ought to discard.

QUOTE: A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in the experience.

QUOTE: I have but one lamp by which my feet are guided, and that is the lamp of experience.

QUOTE: Sleep - the most beautiful experience in life - except drink.
AUTHOR: W. C. Fields

QUOTE: I'd rather have a lot of talent and a little experience than a lot of experience and a little talent.

QUOTE: And so you touch this limit, something happens and you suddenly can go a little bit further. With your mind power, your determination, your instinct, and the experience as well, you can fly very high.
AUTHOR: Ayrton Senna

QUOTE: Our DNA is as a consumer company - for that individual customer who's voting thumbs up or thumbs down. That's who we think about. And we think that our job is to take responsibility for the complete user experience. And if it's not up to par, it's our fault, plain and simply.
AUTHOR: Steve Jobs

QUOTE: I have found little that is 'good' about human beings on the whole. In my experience most of them are trash, no matter whether they publicly subscribe to this or that ethical doctrine or to none at all. That is something that you cannot say aloud, or perhaps even think.
AUTHOR: Sigmund Freud

QUOTE: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you're generally better off sticking with what you know. And the third is that sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
AUTHOR: Donald Trump

QUOTE: One of the greatest moments in anybody's developing experience is when he no longer tries to hide from himself but determines to get acquainted with himself as he really is.
AUTHOR: Norman Vincent Peale

QUOTE: All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous unpremeditated act without benefit of experience.
AUTHOR: Henry Miller

QUOTE: You are not a human being in search of a spiritual experience. You are a spiritual being immersed in a human experience.

QUOTE: DOS is ugly and interferes with users' experience.
AUTHOR: Bill Gates

QUOTE: You learn from a conglomeration of the incredible past - whatever experience gotten in any way whatsoever.

AUTHOR: William James

QUOTE: Italy, and the spring and first love all together should suffice to make the gloomiest person happy.
AUTHOR: Bertrand Russell

QUOTE: If you don't love me, it does not matter, anyway I can love for both of us.
AUTHOR: Stendhal

QUOTE: Love is anterior to life, posterior to death, initial of creation, and the exponent of breath.
AUTHOR: Emily Dickinson

QUOTE: What a grand thing, to be loved! What a grander thing still, to love!
AUTHOR: Victor Hugo

QUOTE: The flowering of love is meditation.
AUTHOR: Jiddu Krishnamurti

QUOTE: This love is silent.
AUTHOR: T. S. Eliot

QUOTE: Love is like the measles. The older you get it, the worse the attack.
AUTHOR: Rainer Maria Rilke

QUOTE: Love is all, it gives all, and it takes all.
AUTHOR: Soren Kierkegaard

QUOTE: To love is to act.
AUTHOR: Victor Hugo

QUOTE: To be in love is merely to be in a state of perceptual anesthesia - to mistake an ordinary young woman for a goddess.

QUOTE: Prayer does not use up artificial energy, doesn't burn up any fossil fuel, doesn't pollute. Neither does song, neither does love, neither does the dance.
AUTHOR: Margaret Mead

QUOTE: Love is the delightful interval between meeting a beautiful girl and discovering that she looks like a haddock.
AUTHOR: John Barrymore

QUOTE: To fall in love is easy, even to remain in it is not difficult; our human loneliness is cause enough. But it is a hard quest worth making to find a comrade through whose steady presence one becomes steadily the person one desires to be.

QUOTE: Nobody loves a woman because she is handsome or ugly, stupid or intelligent. We love because we love.
AUTHOR: Honore de Balzac

QUOTE: I am a real ham. I love an audience. I work better with an audience. I am dead, in fact, without one.
AUTHOR: Lucille Ball

QUOTE: In the Soviet army it takes more courage to retreat than advance.
AUTHOR: Joseph Stalin

QUOTE: The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice, it is conformity.

QUOTE: Courage consists not in hazarding without fear; but being resolutely minded in a just cause.
AUTHOR: Plutarch

QUOTE: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.

QUOTE: It is a blessed thing that in every age some one has had the individuality enough and courage enough to stand by his own convictions.
AUTHOR: Robert Green Ingersoll

QUOTE: It is courage, courage, courage, that raises the blood of life to crimson splendor. Live bravely and present a brave front to adversity.

QUOTE: You will find as you grow older that courage is the rarest of all qualities to be found in public life.

QUOTE: Courage without conscience is a wild beast.

QUOTE: Courage stands halfway between cowardice and rashness, one of which is a lack, the other an excess of courage.

QUOTE: There can be no great courage where there is no confidence or assurance, and half the battle is in the conviction that we can do what we undertake.

QUOTE: To create one's world in any of the arts takes courage.
AUTHOR: Georgia O'Keeffe

QUOTE: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.

QUOTE: Let's drink to the spirit of gallantry and courage that made a strange Heaven out of unbelievable Hell, and let's drink to the hope that one day this country of ours, which we love so much, will find dignity and greatness and peace again.

QUOTE: Eccentricity has always abounded when and where strength of character had abounded; and the amount of eccentricity in a society has generally been proportional to the amount of genius, mental vigor, and courage which it contained.

QUOTE: We've begun to raise daughters more like sons... but few have the courage to raise our sons more like our daughters.

QUOTE: Gray skies are just clouds passing over.

QUOTE: What we call Man's power over Nature turns out to be a power exercised by some men over other men with Nature as its instrument.

QUOTE: For good or for ill, air mastery is today the supreme expression of military power and fleets and armies, however vital and important, must accept a subordinate rank.

QUOTE: Technology has changed things, same as everywhere. But the economy has changed drastically. When Jamaica first won independence, our dollar was stronger than the U.S. dollar. Now ours is about 90 to one. That's had a big impact on crime and poverty.

QUOTE: A revolution is to bring on change and we're spiritual people trying to bring on spiritual change. What hasn't evolved is mankind's spirituality; everything is from 3,000 years ago.

QUOTE: Triumphant science and technology are only at the threshold of man's command over sources of energy so stupendous that, if used for military purposes, they can wipe out our entire civilization.

QUOTE: Like all tools, modern technology has produced some wonderful moments in music and also some horrors.

QUOTE: CRATEL is a center with a two-fold mission - to explore technology as an expressive element and to use technology to bridge gaps between diverse groups of people.
